item.description:
I've heard good things about the Apple Harvest Festival in Southington and they sell those awesome apple fritters! It's also been ages since I have been to a carnival. This will be the Friday night of the 2nd weekend - which is the arts & crafts weekend. The band this nigth is Mammoth Jack.

From the website:
Our annual festival is a family oriented community event spanning the first two weekends in October. The festival offers six days of spectacular fun, delicious food, live entertainment and crafts which showcases local organizations and volunteers that make Southington a wonderful community to live in and visit. Free Admission Free Entertainment Free Parking The festival is located in the heart of Southington surrounding the town green and attracts 100,000 visitors. Activities to enjoy include local entertainment, variety of contests, and on stage music. A children's play area and Carnival offer family fun. Our merchants and food booths offer a wide variety of quality goods and tasty food. The 1st weekend highlights the Parade on Sunday and the Arts and Crafts fair is on the 2nd weekend. The Harvest the Arts program highlights local artists, musicians, and authors. Be sure to stroll down North Main and Center Street to view the activities, participant in contests and listen to music.

check out the website for more information: http://www.southington.org/content/2028/default.aspx
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the live music tent by the Carvel Ice Cream Booth. If you arrive late, text me to find us :) 203-805-8279
item.name: 2011 APPLE HARVEST FESTIVAL
